captions.text: - Well, hello, everyone!

My name is Tyler Oakley,
and currently I am right now

filming this from the
past, but I'm sending it
to me in the future.

So, by the time you're
watching this, I will be living

in another land on the
other side of the world.
But I'm predicting that in that future,

while you are currently
watching this a moment before,
you were craving a Q and Slay.
So it is time for another Q and Slay.

Haley would like to know,
"What kind of old man
"will you be?"
Obviously, I am the old man from "Up".

If you've never seen the
pictures comparing us,
look at them.
I am the old man from "Up".

And instead of telling
people to get off my yard,
I am telling little kids, whoever you are,
you teenage hooligans, get off my wi-fi.

Ayla says, "What YouTuber has
the best hair besides you?"

Obviously, I am biased,
because all of my beautiful

hair colors in the past
make me want every other
YouTuber to have fun hair colors.

So, I will probably have
to go with Jenna Marbles.
She always has such cute hair.

And then, when we see each
other at red carpets and stuff,
we look like people from the future, like,
intergalactic space hookers.

And honestly, obviously,
she is my hairspiration.
She's always killing it.

Myqueentylerx says, "Will
you throw me a kiss?"
Obviously, I will.
Here, gotta just kinda put it (smooches),
and then you do a little bit of that!
You're welcome.

Kylie wants to know what is
my favorite app of the moment.

As you guys know, I
just got back from tour,
and I kinda fell in love with the Lyve app
while I was on tour.

It's like a way for me to have
all of my favorite pictures

and all of the pictures that
I love of me and my friends,
or me and my family, or whatever
all in one place while I'm out on the road
or out and not at home.

And during the holiday season,
having all of my pictures

from the past, not just
from this year but like,
Christmases past.

Basically, it's a way for me
to have all of my pictures
in one place, stored safely at home,

accessible from any
device, and it is free.
So, what is there not to love?

I'm gonna put a link to
the app in the description.
Again, it's called Lyve.

I am obsessed with it, I think
you guys will like it, too.
Go download it, the link is below.
You're welcome in advance.

Precious Oakslay says, "How
do you deal with people
"that try to come for you?"
I would say that nobody can come for me,
unless I call for them.
So, if somebody's trying to come for you,

if you are saying, "Okay,
I'm gonna deal with this,"

that means that you're
allowing it to happen to you.

So, I don't let anybody come
for me unless I call for them.
And if they try to, get, bitch.

Jade says, "What is that
light in the background
of your video?"
That one? Right there?
It's a candle.

Y'all know that I've had a
candle back there for awhile.
What do you think it is?
Like some type of, like, flashing...
Maybe it's like a gay-dar.

Maybe it's going off like,
"Warning, you're watching
"a gay person!"
(laughs) I don't know what a gay-dar does.

But it's a warning, you're
watching a gay person.
I don't know, if you didn't know that,
you are slow. (laughs)

Adie asks if you have any
advice for people whose lives
are not so great right now.
Adie, I'm sorry, that sucks to hear.

I never want to hear that
any of my people's lives
are not necessarily going as planned.
Reach out for help.

The bravest thing you can
do is reach out for help.
And know that I'm on your side,
and I wish the best for you.

And just try to be a
good person, and usually,

good things happen to
those who are good people.

Leila says, "What is your
way of dealing with hunger?"

Why are there so many d-d-d-d-d-dots
right before "hunger"?
I'm like, what do you mean?
What is this implying?
Are you trying to like, get at something
that I don't quite get?
My way of dealing with hunger
is eating.
I don't know what you're asking.
Maybe you're asking because you have
an unhealthy relationship with food.

As somebody who's had an
unhealthy relationship

with food in the past,
I would look at food as

not an enemy but instead
as a resource for you

to have the energy to go out
into the world and accomplish

all of the things that you
want to do in your life.

Teresa wants to know, "Do
you like back scratches?"

(in Southern accent) Oh,
I love a back scratch,
oh my goodness.

(normal voice) Super Oakleaf
says, "What movie should
"they make a sequel of?"
Oh, my gosh, uh...
Hocus Pocus, the next chapter.
And if they need somebody to be the witch
on the vacuum, I'm here, I'll do it!
"How many onesies do you own?"

So, as you guys know, at
my slumber party tour,
I asked everyone to wear onesies.

I also wore a onesie to it,
but not just one onesie.

I actually had a new
onesie for every location.
And that is thanks to SAZAC Kigurumi.
I am gonna link to them below.

But they sent me all of
these onesies that gave me

and Korey a full wardrobe
for the entire tour.
And hopefully, for upcoming shows.

But yeah, if you want to
get some cute onesies,
these are the people that sent them to me.
Thank you to them.
You guys are, like, lifesavers.
I'm gonna link to them below, but yeah.
But yes, I think that is all the questions
I'm gonna answer today.
I hope you have a fabulous life.

If you would like to
see me in Hocus Pocus 2,

give this video a thumbs
up, and then I'll send this
to studios and be like, "Look, it's proof.
"They want me riding a vacuum."
Y'all, let's do this.

If you want to see my latest
video, click right there.

If you want to hear the latest
podcast, click right there.

You guys made it number one on
all of the podcasts recently.
Thank you.

If you haven't gotten it
yet, it's completely free.
Click right there to subscribe.

And if you want to be
my person of the week,
just click right there.
But that is all I have for you guys today.
I hope you have a fabulous life,
and I will see you guys next time.
Later!
This was such a fun Q&A to make.
I had so much fun, did you have fun?

Okay, that's all, there's
nothing I have for this
